purpose.title: 2. General information purpose of the site
points: Provide each Cameroonian or foreign student with essential information on all the courses offered by higher education institutions in Cameroon.
Assist all Cameroonian and foreign students in identifying a course of study and/or a career that suits their ambitions, desires and aptitudes.
To help all Cameroonian students and graduates to prepare effectively for their professional integration.
